1.content:
It's high school; you are attending your required women's studies course for the first time though you are unsure why a women's studies class is required of you. When you enter the classroom, you notice all the students are girls and the teacher is a woman. You are the only man in the room. This isn't everyday though; these girls...there's something about them; they look at you with a devilish smile. One girl, across the room, leans to the side and rips a low bubbler from her ass; her lips smile as the gas steams from her.

"Hello, can I help you?" The teacher asks.

You are still looking at the girl who farted who is now looking at you wondering why you are looking at her.

"Yes, I'm in this class I think."

"What's your name?"
1.title: First Day of Class

choices: Ms. Tylers gives Jim a good lesson.
11.content:
"Jim; Gonolson."

"Yes, I have you here Jimmy. Take a seat next to Natalie."

I should have corrected her; I hated being called Jimmy...maybe later I'd tell her. I turned to see where she pointed; I should have noticed the seat next to the girl that farted was empty. It was now my seat.

I took a seat. Without hesitation or embarrassment, Natlie introduced herself to Jim.

"Hi, my name is Natilie."

"Jim; nice to meet you."

"Settle class; as some of you already know, I'm Ms. Tylers and this is women's studies. Most of you also know I conduct my classes in a very special way."

Ms. Tylers was staring at me now; it was frightening how she pierced my soul with her gaze and sly smile.

"You all saw Mr. Gonolason come in; now I have a seating chart here for how it's going to go."

I shook my head; I figured I must have blanked out for a piece of that conversation because that didn't make sense. I looked around and the girls were nodding. What did they get that I didn't?

"I have Janet first but do you mind if I let Natalie go; she's ready to go."

I looked at Janet but she never looked towards me, "Yeah, that's fine."

I still didn't understand.

"Go ahead Natalie."

Before Ms. Tylers even uddered those words, Natile was up and staring down at me in front of my desk.

She blew glittery dust at me which made me cough as it entered my lungs.

Then, I started to shrink and before I knew it I was about the size of an action figure.

I looked up at Natile's cruel smile; she'd done this or something very similar before, it was in her eyes.

She turned her back to me and lowered her ass closer and closer until she sat on me with her jeaned ass.

PRRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPPPPPPPP!

She sighs, "Ah, I've been holding that one in just for you Jim; did you like it?"

The class laughs as a unit; even Ms. Tylers laughs.

"It's good to be back in school, eh girls?"

They murmur in agreement.
11.title: Jim

1143.title: other student

11432.content:
"Uh, Ms. Tyler; can we go next?" Asked Fran sitting next to her twin sister, Jan; they look to each other with a slight smile.

"Well, I don't know why I bother making a list but since you ladies can be so democratic about it, sure," says Ms. Tyler.

Janet scoffs a bit, "Well, I'm going after them."

Meanwhile, I'm dying under the blast that Natalie hit me with, smelling rank of rotting meat and vegetables; I try to scurry away but soon she lifts her massive ass off me. She turns to me, "Awww, well I'll be seeing you later, Jimmy." Her eyes glowed with such hunger.

She picks me up and quickly, nauseatingly, tosses me to Fran who, thankfully catches me in her cupped hands.

"Jan, you care to go first?" Fran says, still holding me in her cupped hands; holding me like a prison now.

"Ya, I will go." Jan says, standing and turning her butt on her sister's cupped hands.

BRRRRRRRRRrrrrrrrruuuuuupppppppp!

Her fart echoes and blows my body around between her ass and Fran's hands, rattling me around in a tiny bowl of horrific smell; like something spoiled, but I had no idea what the fuck it was...I'd never smelled anything so wretched! I feel my head getting light; my throat burned and score with methane. I scream but it's just a horse whisper.

"Oh, that is so strong!" Fran laughs, "okay, now you hold him." Fran says to Jan.

Jan takes me by the shirt and lifts me from the putrid bowl.

Fran pulls down her pants, showing her Pikachu panties.

Jan giggles as she presses me, with her palm, against her sister's ass.

"Hold on, fart boy!" Fran exclaims...

PRRRRRRRRRRrrraaaaaaaapppppppppppppppppppp!

A long, airy fart blows back the hair on my face as my nose is confronted, pressed up against the disgusting smelling hole of this Swedish girl; my head desperately tries to recoil away but her sister's grip is too tight.

The girls sniff the air around them, enjoying their fumes as the rest of the class holds their noses to the inhuman gas that comes out of these girls.

Meanwhile, I convulse and shake as I'm held tightly against my will, pressed up to a terrible, farting ass; my breathing heavy, labored. I choke and sputter on left over fart fumes.
11432.title: fran and jan

11433.title: other student

info.brief_description: You find you are the only man in your women's studies course. Jackpot, right? WRONG!
info.description:
I don't want to bind people in rules; I hate rules and if things are done well then a certain amount of bending or breaking of rules shouldn't really matter...

All I ask is TRY to keep it on farting; pooping is OKAY but farting should always be the focus or main point.

Also, Jim can never like farts; if you create another character than you can do with him/her as you please.
